all_damage_resist_buff_removal_no_assist: removes Dmg. Reduction (Attack Type: All Targets) Buffs
all_damage_resist_debuff_removal_no_assi: removes Dmg. Reduction (Attack Type: All Targets) Debuffs
single_damage_resist_buff_removal_no_ass: removes Dmg. Reduction (Attack Type: Single Target) Buffs
single_damage_resist_debuff_removal_no_a: removes Dmg. Reduction (Attack Type: Single Target) Debuffs
all_damage_resist_buffs: Dmg. received (Attack Type: All Targets) reduction
all_damage_resist_debuffs: Skill effect that increases Dmg. received (Attack Type: All Targets)
single_damage_resist_buffs: Dmg. received (Attack Type: Single Target) reduction
single_damage_resist_debuffs: Skill effect that increases Dmg. received (Attack Type: Single Target)
per_each_target_strength_buff: per each Target's Str. Buff Skill
per_each_target_strength_debuff: per each Target's Str. Reduction Skill
per_each_target_magic_buff: per each Target's Mag. Buff Skill
per_each_target_magic_debuff: per each Target's Mag. Reduction Skill
per_each_target_agility_buff: per each Target's Agi. Buff Skill
per_each_target_agility_debuff: per each Target's Agi. Reduction Skill
per_each_target_dexterity_debuff: per each Target's Dex. Reduction Skill
per_each_target_endurance_debuff: per each Target's End. Reduction Skill
per_each_target_physical_resist_buff: per each Target's P.Resist Buff Skill
per_each_target_physical_resist_debuff: per each Target's P.Resist Reduction Skill
per_each_target_magic_resist_buff: per each Target's M.Resist Buff Skill
per_each_target_magic_resist_debuff: per each Target's M.Resist Reduction Skill
per_each_self_single_damage_resist_buff: per each [Self] Dmg. Reduction Skill (Attack Type: Single Target)
per_each_self_single_damage_resist_debuf: per each [Self] Skill effect that increases Dmg. received (Attack Type: Single Target)
per_each_self_all_damage_resist_buff: per each [Self] Dmg. Reduction Skill (Attack Type: All Targets)
per_each_self_all_damage_resist_debuff: per each [Self] Skill effect that increases Dmg. received (Attack Type: All Targets)
per_each_target_single_damage_resist_deb: per each Target's Skill effect that increases Dmg. received (Attack Type: Single Target)
per_each_target_all_damage_resist_debuff: per each Target's Skill effect that increases Dmg. received (Attack Type: All Targets)
per_each_target_fire_resist_debuff: per each Target's Fire Resist Reduction Skill
per_each_target_water_resist_debuff: per each Target's Water Resist Reduction Skill
per_each_target_thunder_resist_debuff: per each Target's Thunder Resist Reduction Skill
per_each_target_earth_resist_debuff: per each Target's Earth Resist Reduction Skill
per_each_target_wind_resist_debuff: per each Target's Wind Resist Reduction Skill
per_each_target_light_resist_debuff: per each Target's Light Resist Reduction Skill
per_each_target_dark_resist_debuff: per each Target's Dark Resist Reduction Skill
per_each_self_guard_rate_buff: per each [Self] Guard Rate Buff Skill
per_each_target_guard_rate_debuff: per each Target's Guard Rate Reduction Skill
per_each_self_counter_rate_buff: per each [Self] Counter Rate Buff Skill
per_each_target_counter_rate_debuff: per each Target's Counter Rate Reduction Skill
per_each_self_critical_rate_buff: per each [Self] Critical Rate Buff Skill
per_each_target_critical_rate_debuff: per each Target's Critical Rate Reduction Skill
per_each_self_penetration_rate_buff: per each [Self] Penetration Rate Buff Skill
per_each_target_penetration_rate_debuff: per each Target's Penetration Rate Reduction Skill
per_each_self_fire_attack_buff: per each [Self] Fire Attack Dmg. Buff Skill
per_each_self_water_attack_buff: per each [Self] Water Attack Dmg. Buff Skill
per_each_self_thunder_attack_buff: per each [Self] Thunder Attack Dmg. Buff Skill
per_each_self_earth_attack_buff: per each [Self] Earth Attack Dmg. Buff Skill
per_each_self_wind_attack_buff: per each [Self] Wind Attack Dmg. Buff Skill
per_each_self_light_attack_buff: per each [Self] Light Attack Dmg. Buff Skill
per_each_self_dark_attack_buff: per each [Self] Dark Attack Dmg. Buff Skill
per_each_target_heal_modifier_buff: per each Target's Heal Buff Skill
per_each_target_heal_modifier_debuff: per each Target's Heal Reduction Skill
per_each_target_sleep_debuff: only when a target is inflicted with Sleep
per_each_target_stun_debuff: only when a target is inflicted with Stun
per_each_target_seal_debuff: only when a target is inflicted with Seal
per_each_target_slow_debuff: only when a target is inflicted with Slow
per_each_target_taunt_debuff: only when a target is inflicted with Taunt
per_each_target_poison_debuff: only when a target is inflicted with Poison
per_each_target_charm_debuff: only when a target is inflicted with Charm
per_each_target_hp_regen_buff: per each Target's HP Regen Skill
per_each_self_sa_gauge_charge_buff: per each [Self] S.A Gauge Charge Buff effect
